ygData.subject: Re: Shadowknights Heat Blood and Sand Giants bad bug =(
ygData.msgSnippet: Many bugs with DOt spells, I am a necro and my corpses dissapear when I use them in najena and unrest. Morgul ... From: ken  To:
ygData.messageBody:
Many bugs with DOt spells, I am a necro and my corpses dissapear when I use
them in najena and unrest.
Morgul
----- Original Message -----
From: ken <brooksc@...>
To: <shadowknight@onelist.com>
Sent: Sunday, May 30, 1999 9:52 PM
Subject: [shadowknight] Shadowknights Heat Blood and Sand Giants bad bug =(


> From: "ken" <brooksc@...>
>
> Hello fellow Shadowknights
>
>
> Ok when heat blood finish's off a Sand Giant his corpse will
disappear.
> It happened twice tongiht so when your out there killing SG's dont use
heat
> blood. Also maybe im just bugged so can somebody test this out and see if
> the same thing happens. Also it must be a Shadowknight that casts Heat
Blood
> not a Necromancer.
>
> Trian Soulreaper
>
